# IssueVista Development Roadmap

## Project Status - Updated After Issue Swap

---

## Project Metrics

| Metric               | Count |
| -------------------- | ----- |
| Total Open Issues    | 133   |
| AI-Allowed Technical | 63    |
| AI-Disallowed Docs   | 70    |
| Completed Issues     | 18    |
| Total Issues         | 151   |

---

## Uplift Strategy Summary

All issues have been categorized to optimize Uplift earnings:

- **AI-Allowed slots**: Only technical/feature implementation work
- **AI-Disallowed slots**: Only documentation work

---

## Epics Overview

| Epic ID | Epic Name                     | Issues | Type      |
| ------- | ----------------------------- | ------ | --------- |
| EPIC-1  | Core Features (AI-Allowed)    | 21     | Technical |
| EPIC-2  | Backend Infrastructure        | 11     | Technical |
| EPIC-3  | Testing & Quality             | 17     | Technical |
| EPIC-4  | Accessibility                 | 5      | Technical |
| EPIC-5  | Maintenance & Chore           | 9      | Technical |
| EPIC-6  | Documentation (AI-Disallowed) | 70     | Docs      |

---

## AI-DISALLOWED DOCUMENTATION WORK

### EPIC-6: Documentation (70 Issues)

All documentation work is in AI-Disallowed slots for higher earnings rate.

**Categories:**

- Component Documentation (#120, #123, #124, #126)
- Feature Documentation (#130, #132-136, #138)
- API Documentation (#141, #143, #144, #146, #148)
- User Guides (#155, #157, #159)
- Architecture Guides (#164, #165, #167, #168)
- Reference Documentation (#169-176, #179, #182, #184-186, #189)
- Best Practices (#196-198, #200, #204-206, #209-213, #218-219)
- Previous Feature Designs (#5, #7-9, #11-12, #18-19, #25-29, #31, #36, #55, #57, #60, #63)

---

## Sprint Planning

### Sprint 1-2: Core Features (AI-Allowed)

Focus: New feature implementations from swapped issues
Issues: #121, #122, #125, #127, #128, #129, #131

### Sprint 3-4: UI Enhancements (AI-Allowed)

Focus: User experience improvements
Issues: #137, #139, #140, #142, #145, #147

### Sprint 5-6: Analytics & Visualization (AI-Allowed)

Focus: Dashboard and analytics features
Issues: #149, #150, #151, #152, #153, #154, #156, #158

### Sprint 7-8: Backend Infrastructure (AI-Allowed)

Focus: Original backend features
Issues: #22, #24, #47, #53, #54, #56, #58, #59, #61, #64, #65

### Sprint 9-10: Testing (AI-Allowed)

Focus: Test coverage expansion
Issues: #190-195, #199, #201-203, #207-208

### Sprint 11-12: Maintenance (AI-Allowed)

Focus: Configuration and workflow improvements
Issues: #160-163, #166, #172, #174, #177, #178, #211, #214-217

### Ongoing: Documentation (AI-Disallowed)

Focus: All documentation work
Issues: All 70 documentation issues

---

## Priority Matrix

| Priority | AI-Allowed (Technical)        | AI-Disallowed (Docs)         |
| -------- | ----------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| P0       | New FEATURE issues (#121-158) | Architecture docs (#167-168) |
| P1       | Backend (#53-65)              | User guides (#155-159)       |
| P2       | Testing (#190-208)            | Reference docs (#169-189)    |
| P3       | Maintenance (#160-178)        | Legacy feature docs (#5-63)  |

---

## Definition of Ready (DoR)

- [ ] Issue has clear title and description
- [ ] Acceptance criteria defined
- [ ] Correct labels applied
- [ ] AI-Allowed/Disallowed status confirmed
- [ ] Dependencies identified

## Definition of Done (DoD)

- [ ] Implementation complete
- [ ] Tests passing (if technical)
- [ ] CodeRabbit approved
- [ ] PR merged with --merge
- [ ] Uplift Tracker updated
- [ ] Earnings recorded

---
